response.original_title: Artists of the 20th Century: Joan Miro
response.overview: Joan Mir√≥, a Catalan-Spanish artist, was a prominent figure in 20th-century art, known for his distinctive style that blended abstract art with Surrealist fantasy. He was a painter, sculptor, ceramicist, and printmaker, and his work is characterized by whimsical, dreamlike imagery and a unique visual language.
response.title: Artists of the 20th Century: Joan Miro
